SenderEmailAddress.name: SenderEmailAddress
SenderEmailAddress.description: Represents a From address in a marketing email.

DisplayName.description: A descriptive name that makes the sender email address easier to identify.

EmailDomainKeyId.description: The unique system ID of the domain associated with the sender email address.

Name.description: A unique identifier for the sender email address.

OwnerId.description: The unique user ID of the user who owns the sender email address object.

Username.description: The part of the email address that comes before the @ symbol.
